birth_place.zh-cn: 中华民国江西省兴国县
birth_place.en: Xingguo County, Jiangxi, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将。1955年获三级八一勋章、二级独立自由勋章、一级解放勋章，1988年获一级红星功勋荣誉章。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the Chinese People's Liberation Army. He was awarded the Third Class Medal of August 1st, the Second Class Medal of Independence and Freedom, and the First Class Medal of Liberation in 1955, and the First Class Red Star Meritorious Honor Medal in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国江西省赣州市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the administration of Ganzhou, Jiangxi, China.

en: Senior Party School of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的、以研究宣传马克思列宁主义、毛泽东思想、中国特色社会主义理论体系为主要任务的机构。
description.en: An institution directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, whose main task is to research and promote Marxism-Leninism, Mao Zedong Thought, and the theoretical system of socialism with Chinese characteristics.

nodes.id: 中华苏维埃共和国西北革命军事委员会后方办事处

zh-cn: 中华苏维埃共和国西北革命军事委员会后方办事处

description.zh-cn: 中华苏维埃共和国时期的一个军事后勤组织。
description.en: A military logistics organization during the Chinese Soviet Republic period.

nodes.id: 中国工农红军总政治部

zh-cn: 中国工农红军总政治部
en: General Political Department of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的最高政治工作领导机关。
description.en: The highest political work leading organ of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

nodes.id: 中国工农红军第十五军团

zh-cn: 中国工农红军第十五军团
en: 15th Army Group of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支重要部队。
description.en: An important unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

en: 1st Column of the Eighth Route Army

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争期间八路军的一支部队。
description.en: A unit of the Eighth Route Army during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

en: Shandong Column of the Eighth Route Army

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争期间八路军在山东地区的一支主要武装力量。
description.en: A major armed force of the Eighth Route Army in the Shandong region during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在中国山东省设立的军区。
description.en: A military region established by the People's Liberation Army in Shandong Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争和第二次国共内战时期，中国共产党领导的一支主力部队。
description.en: A main force led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War and the second phase of the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 国共内战时期的一个军事指挥机构。
description.en: A military command structure during the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期的主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the second phase of the Chinese Civil War.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第三野战军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第三野战军
en: Third Field Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战末期和中华人民共和国建国初期的主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army in the late period of the Chinese Civil War and the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在朝鲜战争中派遣的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces deployed by the People's Republic of China during the Korean War.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总政治部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总政治部
en: General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军的最高政治工作机关。
description.en: Formerly the highest political work organ of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军军事工程学院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事工程学院

description.zh-cn: 简称“哈军工”，是1950年代在中国哈尔滨市创建的一所著名军事院校。
description.en: Known as 'Harbin Military Engineering Institute', it was a famous military academy founded in Harbin, China in the 1950s.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经存在的一个组成部门，负责管理国家基本建设工作。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for managing national capital construction.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军七大军区之一。
description.en: Formerly one of the seven military regions of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军政治学院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军政治学院

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军的一所高等军事院校。
description.en: Formerly a higher military academy of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要国家武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 谢有法于1936年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Xie Youfa joined the Communist Party of China in 1936.

description.zh-cn: 谢有法出生于江西省兴国县。
description.en: Xie Youfa was born in Xingguo County, Jiangxi.

description.zh-cn: 1956年，谢有法进入中共中央高级党校学习。
description.en: In 1956, Xie Youfa studied at the Senior Party School of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中华苏维埃共和国西北革命军事委员会后方办事处

position.en: Detachment Leader of the Political Department's Propaganda Team

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华苏维埃共和国西北革命军事委员会后方办事处政治部宣传队分队长。
description.en: Served as the Detachment Leader of the Political Department's Propaganda Team at the Rear Office of the Northwest Revolutionary Military Committee of the Chinese Soviet Republic.

relationships.target: 中国工农红军总政治部

position.en: Statistics Clerk of the Organization Section

description.zh-cn: 曾任红军总政治部组织科统计干事。
description.en: Served as a Statistics Clerk of the Organization Section in the General Political Department of the Red Army.

relationships.target: 中国工农红军第十五军团

position.en: Political Commissar of the 232nd Regiment, 78th Division

description.zh-cn: 曾任红15军团第78师232团政治委员。
description.en: Served as the Political Commissar of the 232nd Regiment, 78th Division of the 15th Army Group of the Red Army.

position.en: Chief of the Organization Section of the Political Department

description.zh-cn: 曾任八路军第1纵队政治部组织科科长。
description.en: Served as the Chief of the Organization Section of the Political Department of the 1st Column of the Eighth Route Army.

position.en: Director of the Organization Department of the Political Department

description.zh-cn: 曾任山东纵队政治部组织部部长。
description.en: Served as the Director of the Organization Department of the Political Department of the Shandong Column.

position.en: Director of the Organization Department of the Political Department

description.zh-cn: 曾任山东军区政治部组织部部长。
description.en: Served as the Director of the Organization Department of the Political Department of the Shandong Military Region.

position.zh-cn: 兼山东军区政治部组织部部长
position.en: Concurrent Director of the Organization Department of the Political Department of the Shandong Military Region

description.zh-cn: 曾任新四军兼山东军区政治部组织部副部长，后升任部长。
description.en: Served as the Deputy Director of the Organization Department of the Political Department of the New Fourth Army and Shandong Military Region, later promoted to Director.

description.zh-cn: 曾任津浦前线指挥部政治部主任。
description.en: Served as the Director of the Political Department of the Jin-Pu Front Command.

position.en: Director of the Political Department of the Eastern Front Corps

description.zh-cn: 曾任华东野战军东线兵团政治部主任。
description.en: Served as the Director of the Political Department of the Eastern Front Corps of the East China Field Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第三野战军

position.en: Director of the Political Department of the 9th Army Group

description.zh-cn: 曾任第三野战军9兵团政治部主任。
description.en: Served as the Director of the Political Department of the 9th Army Group of the Third Field Army.

position.en: Director of the Political Department of the 9th Army Group

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国人民志愿军第9兵团政治部主任。
description.en: Served as the Director of the Political Department of the 9th Army Group of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总政治部

position.en: Deputy Director of the Organization Department

description.zh-cn: 曾任人民解放军总政治部组织部副部长。
description.en: Served as the Deputy Director of the Organization Department of the PLA General Political Department.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军军事工程学院

description.zh-cn: 曾任哈尔滨军事工程学院政治委员。
description.en: Served as the Political Commissar of the PLA Military Institute of Engineering (Harbin Military Engineering Institute).

description.zh-cn: 曾任国家基本建设委员会政治部主任。
description.en: Served as the Director of the Political Department of the State Capital Construction Commission.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区

description.zh-cn: 曾任沈阳军区副政治委员。
description.en: Served as the Deputy Political Commissar of the Shenyang Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军政治学院

description.zh-cn: 曾任政治学院政治委员。
description.en: Served as the Political Commissar of the Political College.

description.zh-cn: 谢有法是中国人民解放军中将。
description.en: Xie Youfa was a lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army.
